title: Love Island's Harley Brash shows off figure in skimpy white dress
text:
She's been single since splitting from her fellow Love Island 2019 contestant, Chris Taylor.

And Harley Brash was enjoying a night out in London on Tuesday, visiting the Bluebird Chelsea in a skimpy white minidress.

The reality star, who was the first of the latest crop of Love Island stars to split from their on-screen partner, showcased her svelte physique in the silky number.

All-white on the night: Harley Brash was enjoying a night out in London on Tuesday, visiting the Bluebird Chelsea in a skimpy white minidress

Harley exuded confidence in her off-the-shoulders number, working her best angles as she posed outside the venue.

The blonde bombshell matched her knee-high boots to her frock, making the most of her petite frame.

The starlet styled her long hair down straight and opted to wear no jewellery, letting her all-white outfit take centre stage.

Confident: Harley exuded confidence in her off-the-shoulders number as she headed out solo

Bit of all-white: The blonde bombshell matched her knee-high boots to her frock, making the most of her petite frame

Speaking to Stephen Leng on Fubar Radio, Harley opened up about her break-up from business development manager Chris and admitted to kissing mystery boys since their split.

She said last month: 'I’m happy being single at the moment. I’m just enjoying myself.

'I’m having fun. I don’t kiss and tell but it is nice.'

Keeping it simple: The starlet styled her long hair down straight and opted to wear no jewellery, letting her outfit take centre stage

On her split from the business development manager, Harley confessed: 'We were just better off as friends…we had such busy schedules and we both realised that it was better to break it off now and we could still be friends.'

The TV star also praised her Love Island friendships: 'Everyone has got everyone’s back and best interests at heart. It is like a little family.

'I could ring anyone up from the show and be like, "look I’ve got this issue I’ve got this problem, can you help us out and give us a bit of advice" and not one person would say no.'
description: Harley Brash was enjoying a night out in London on Tuesday, visiting the Bluebird Chelsea in a skimpy white minidress.
